comments:
Test Driver ID: TPTP-4.2.0-200604101029

Steps: 
  1) Create the sample: File > New > Example > Logging > Analysis Engine Sample
  2) Read the help file that pops up and run the example to make sure that it works.

Result:

Right click a log record of the Log View and choose the 'Simple Analysis Engine' popup menu item. Check the analysis result in properties view and the following exception occurs.

[I confirmed this problem with Alex and he is seeing this problem, too.]

Alex, ask Dave to move this to i3
